page.title: 15 MUSLIMS
page.content: A SMALL NUMBER OF THE COMUNITY ARE MUSLIMS.THERE IS NO MOSQUE IN GRAVESEND EVERY FRIDAY THE MUSLIM MEN MUST TRY TO GO TO LONDON TO THE NEAREST MOSQUE.IF THE MEN CAN'T GO THEY MUST PRAY AT HOME WITH THEIR FAMILIES.THE PEOPLE GO TO THE MOSQUE MUST EITHER WASH THEMSELVES AT HOME OR IN THE MOSQUE.IF THEY WASH IN THE MOSQUE THEY HAVE TO WASH EVERYTHING 3 TIMES,THE PARTS OF THE BODY THEY WASH ARE THERE HANDS,FACE, FEET,AND ARMS.THEY ALSO GARGLE AND BLOW THEIR NOSES THEN THEY WASH THEIR HANDS AGAIN.THE LADIES DO THE SAME AT HOME. SHOES AND SOCKS ARE TAKEN OFF BEFORE PRAYERS OR BEFORE GOING INTO THE MOSQUE THE MEN SIT ON THE FLOOR ON A MAT.THERE IS A SIMPLE SERVICE OF PRAYERS LED BY THE IMAM.THERE IS NO SINGING.
